title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: One of the reasons why I don't take much of the information the media feeds people during war very seriously is the high rate of propaganda that is spread.I followed up extensively on the the Russia-Ukrainnn war and because I wanted real facts I had to watch the news from different channels. When you watch the news/ information coming from the channels supporting Russia, you see how different it is from the information/ news you get from channels supporting Ukraine. This shows how majority of people have been misled because they constantly listen to information from a particular angle and there sense of judgement become disrupted because due to constant blackmail that is coursed from politically motivated media.And today the news of isreal Palestinian war is flying around so many headlines with people spreading so many fake information around the different social media platforms.As your support who you choose to support for reasons best known to you or received from channels available at your region, don't forget that most media can be very political and might feed people with wrong information just to gain pity or continue in there outrageous act.Be guided.
